entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 28. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
